name: 呂志誠
objective: CAD套裝軟體介紹、CAD數值技巧、二維畫圖、三維畫圖、曲面模型、實體模型建立、動畫之製作、最佳化設計、整合性之CAD系統及專題。
schedule:
週次         單元主題
1.　　Introduction to CAD
2.　　Hardware and graphic coordinate system
3.　　Computer graphics
4.　　Geometric modeling concept
5.       Mid-term exam
6.　　CAD Lab (I) – introduction to ProEngineer (ProE)
7.　　CAD Lab (II) - 2D drawing techniques
8.　　CAD Lab (III) – 2D drawing techniques
9.　　Project 1 and report
10.　　CAD Lab (IV) – 3D drawing techniques
11.　　CAD Lab (V) – 3D drawing techniques
12.　　CAD Lab (VI) – 3D drawing techniques
13.　　Project 2 and report
14.　　CAD Lab (VII) - Assembly
15.　　Final exam (hands-on software operation)
scorePolicy:
出席 : 10%
期中考與期末考 :各20%
Projects與平時Homework : 50%
materials:
教科書 (Textbook):
P.N. Rao, CAD/CAM principles and applications, 2004, McGraw Hill, (高立圖書), ISBN-007-1242317.
應用軟體 (Software)
Pro-E
